title.rendered: William Stackable Side Chair with Upholstered Seat and Back

content.rendered:
The William Side chair can be used in a variety of settings. Its simple design means it can be using in a dining area, waiting area, auditorium and many other areas without looking out of place.

Available in a range of fabric options from stock as well as the option to have a fixed joining bracket to keep the William side chairs in a fixed position or rows. 

The William Side chair is made with a plywood shell and a 4 leg chrome plated frame. It is also stackable up to 8 chairs high.

The fabric used on this chair is Camira Xtreme CS.

This item carries a 3 year guarantee

Available for delivery in 10 working days.
